rbw.shapes package¶

Describes geometric and physical properties of objecs.

Submodules¶

rbw.shapes.ball module¶

class rbw.shapes.ball.Ball(appearance, dims, physics)[source]¶

Bases: rbw.shapes.shape.Shape

Instance of shape.Shape describing spheres

property dimensions¶

The xyz extremas of a given object type.

property shape¶

The name of the shape :returns: A shape name :rtype: str

property volume¶

Defined as volume of an elliptical cylinder. :returns: the volume the shape holds :rtype: float

The xyz extremas of a given object type.

property shape¶

rbw.shapes.shape module¶

class rbw.shapes.shape.Shape(appearance, dims, physics)[source]¶

Bases: rbw.shapes.kin_obj.KinematicObject

property appearance¶

Returns the appearance descriptor

property density¶

Returns the density in grams/m^3

abstract property dimensions¶

The xyz extremas of a given object type.

property friction¶

Returns the friction coefficient used by Bullet3D

property mass¶

Returns the mass in units :returns: volume * density :rtype: float

property physics¶

Returns a dict containing physical properties :returns: physical properties :rtype: dict

serialize()[source]¶

Returns a json friendly dictionary representation :rtype: dict

abstract property shape¶

The name of the shape :returns: A shape name :rtype: str

abstract property volume¶

Should be implemented by children. :returns: volume in m^3 :rtype: float

rbw.shapes.shape.change_prop(obj, prop, val)[source]¶

Returns a new object with updated physical property
